title: The Week 17 Games That Matter and Season-long Awards | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 372)
description:
Previewing the Titans-Colts, Bears-Vikings, and Ravens-Browns games (0:30). Plus, on this week's Take Shop, there's a surprising amount of playoff teams that could win the Super Bowl and there are questions about Matt Patricia’s coaching future in Detroit (32:00), as well as season-long awards and the conversations surrounding them (45:00)
Hosts: Kevin Clark and Robert Mays

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
